column5: IM LOOKING FOR A BAIT SHOP IN VERMILLION BAY? I THINK IT MAY BE A CLARK GAS STATION.LOOKING FOR A PHONE# OR NAME. THANKS FOR ANY HELP
It's the Village Corner. The phone # is 807-227-2671, fax 807-227-5352. I have reserved leeches from them in the past. Very accomodating.
There is also Bobby's Corner.....807-227-2695. Also very well stocked.
Bobby's Corner, love that shop. Hard to go thru the door without dropping a $200 on tackle!
CAN ANYONE HELP OUT ON A BAIT STORE IN THE RED LAKE AREA ? I WOULD LIKE TO ORDER SOME SUCKERS,DEADBAIT AND LG.MINNOWS. THANKS PIKE PRO

We stop in Ear Falls on our way to Nungesser. Smittys or Four Season Sport Shop have been great for leeches, I'm not sure about the other items, but they are both full service bait shops. We order leeches before we leave and pick them up on the way. Hope this helps.
Here's the number for Four Seasons Sport Shop in Ear Falls 807-222-2200. Mike and Pam are really nice people. Here's the website [email protected]. Bonus, they are also Walleye Central fans.
Rose, you are right, they are great people, but they still are Packer fans. Maybe with Favre gone, we can now convert them.
HEY, I'm a Packer fan too! I bet your from Mn?
